summary: The code declares a "greeting" variable with the value "Goodbye World!". It then defines an IO action "main", which prints the greeting using putStrLn function.

details.comment: The code declares a "greeting" variable with the value "Goodbye World!". It then defines an IO action "main", which prints the greeting using putStrLn function.
details.content:
greeting :: String
greeting = "Goodbye " ++ "World!"
-- asshole :: IO ()
main = do
  putStrLn greeting
